thread.title: Ombudsman's bid to launch own inquiries
thread.title_full: Ombudsman's bid to launch own inquiries - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ombudsman's bid to launch own inquiries
text: The Public Services Ombudsman has asked the Welsh assembly to give him more powers. Nick Bennett told BBC Radio Cymru he wanted permission to begin his own inquiries rather than just respond to complaints. He also said he wanted to investigate verbal complaints. Mr Bennett said he expected draft legislation on the issues to be published before the end of the week. Share this story About sharing
